item.title: 雀巢、巴里-卡乐宝、re.green 将修复巴西可可和咖啡种植区
item.description: 雀巢公司周四宣布与重新造林初创企业 re.green 和巧克力制造商 Barry Callebaut 在巴西合作开展环境恢复项目，力求在其主要原料产地种植数百万棵树。【原文：Nestle announced on Thursday environmental restoration projects in partnership with reforestation startup re.green and chocolatier Barry Callebaut in Brazil, seeking to plant millions of trees in areas where it sources key ingredients.】

item.title: 韩国最高法院宣判三星董事长李在镕2015年兼并欺诈案无罪
item.description: 最高法院的判决永久性地消除了李在镕长期以来的法律困扰，因为三星正在全球开发尖端人工智能芯片的竞赛中奋起直追。【原文：The Supreme Court's verdict permanently removes a long-running legal distraction for Lee as Samsung plays catch-up in a global race to develop cutting-edge AI chips.】

item.title: 美联储大戏扑朔迷离，科技股财报前股价飘忽不定
item.description: 周四，在重量级科技公司发布财报之前，亚洲股市踌躇不前，市场对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）任期不确定的忧虑挥之不去。【原文：Asian stocks dithered on Thursday ahead of earnings from heavyweight technology companies and as market anxiety lingered over the uncertain tenure of Federal Reserve chief Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 6 月失业率跃升至 3 年半新高
item.description: 澳大利亚 6 月份的就业率仅略有上升，而失业率则跃升至 2021 年末以来的最高点，这或许是一直异常坚挺的劳动力市场首次出现裂痕，从而为下月降息提供了更多理由。【原文：Australian employment rose only marginally in June as the jobless rate jumped to the highest since late 2021, showing perhaps the first crack in what had been an unusually resilient labour market that adds to the case for a rate cut next month.】

item.title: 日本贸易谈判代表赤泽在电话中与卢特尼克讨论美国关税问题
item.description: 日本政府称，日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世周四就美国关税问题与美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）进行了45分钟的电话会谈。【原文：Japan's government said its top trade negotiator, Ryosei Akazawa, held a 45-minute phone call with U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick on U.S. tariffs on Thursday.】

item.title: 市场担忧美联储独立性，美元走势不稳
item.description: 由于担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）准备解雇美联储主席，动摇了美国市场的信心，美元周四走势脆弱，隔夜一度失守。【原文：The dollar was on a fragile footing on Thursday having lost ground overnight as concerns U.S. President Donald Trump was preparing to fire the Federal Reserve chair shook confidence in U.S. markets.】

item.title: 美联储主席威廉姆斯不愿就特朗普攻击央行发表评论
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周三拒绝就唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统对央行的攻击发表评论，也拒绝就总统以某种方式解除美联储领导人职务可能意味着什么发表评论。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams declined on Wednesday to comment on President Donald Trump’s attacks on the central bank and what it might mean if the president were to somehow remove the Fed’s leader from office.】

item.title: 需求希望和经济数据提振市场情绪，石油价格上涨
item.description: 受全球主要石油消费国经济数据强于预期以及贸易紧张局势缓和迹象的提振，周四早盘油价上涨，扭转了上一交易日的跌势。【原文：Oil prices rose in early trade on Thursday, reversing the previous session's losses, buoyed by stronger-than-expected economic data from the world’s top oil consumers and signs of easing trade tensions.】

item.title: 受美国关税影响，日本出口连续第二个月下降
item.description: 周四的数据显示，日本 6 月份出口连续第二个月下降，凸显了美国全面关税对日本脆弱经济造成的日益严重的压力。【原文：Japan's exports fell for a second straight month in June, data showed on Thursday, underscoring the mounting strain that sweeping U.S. tariffs are placing on the country's fragile economy.】

item.title: 日本 6 月出口同比下降 0.5
item.description: 日本财务省周四公布的数据显示，日本 6 月份出口同比下降 0.5%，连续第二个月下降。【原文：Japanese exports dropped 0.5% year-on-year in June, down for a second straight month, data from the Ministry of Finance showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普称印度贸易协定接近达成，欧洲也有可能达成协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三在接受 "真实美国之声 "节目采访时说，美国非常接近与印度达成贸易协议，同时也有可能与欧洲达成协议，但现在说能否与加拿大达成协议还为时过早。【原文：The United States is very close to a trade deal with India, while an agreement could possibly be reached with Europe as well, but it is too soon to say whether a deal can be agreed with Canada, President Donald Trump said in an interview aired on Real America's Voice on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普撤销美国对加州高铁项目的 40 亿美元资助
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三表示，交通部将取消美国政府为加州高铁项目提供的 40 亿美元资金。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday the Transportation Department is rescinding $4 billion in U.S. government funding for California's High-Speed Rail project.】

item.title: 随着计算能力需求的不断增长，OpenAI 将谷歌列为云计算合作伙伴
item.description: 根据 ChatGPT 制造商网站上公布的最新名单，OpenAI 已将 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌云（Google Cloud）纳入其供应商行列，以满足对计算能力不断升级的需求。【原文：OpenAI has included Alphabet's Google Cloud among its suppliers to meet escalating demands for computing capacity, according to an updated list published on the ChatGPT maker's website.】

item.title: 特朗普表示希望美联储主席鲍威尔辞职
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他很希望美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）辞职，但他也承认，许多人都说如果总统要解除他的职务，将会扰乱市场。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said he would love for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to resign but acknowledged that many have said it would disrupt the markets if the president were to remove him.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，沃尔玛将裁减数百个门店支持职位
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引一份备忘录报道称，沃尔玛正在裁减数百个门店支持职位，这是沃尔玛简化结构的最新举措。【原文：Walmart is cutting hundreds of store-support roles, in its latest move to simply its structure, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing a memo.】

item.title: 美国告知汽车制造商过去三年不再面临燃油经济性处罚
item.description: 美国监管机构表示，根据唐纳德-特朗普总统本月签署的一项法律，汽车制造商在2022车型年未能达到燃油效率规定将不会面临罚款。【原文：Automakers face no fines for failures to meet fuel efficiency rules dating back to the 2022 model year under a law signed by President Donald Trump this month, U.S. regulators said.】

item.title: 美联储主席威廉姆斯称关税对经济的影响才刚刚开始
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周三表示，货币政策正处于正确的位置，央行行长们可以在采取下一步措施之前对经济进行监测，他还警告说，贸易关税对经济的影响才刚刚开始。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said Wednesday that monetary policy is in the right place to allow central bankers to monitor the economy before taking their next steps, and he warned that the impact of trade tariffs is only just starting to hit the economy.】

item.title: Couche-Tard 撤消对 Seven & i 公司价值 470 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: 加拿大零售商 Alimentation Couche-Tard 周三表示，将以缺乏 "建设性 "接触为由，撤回对日本 Seven & i 控股公司价值 470 亿美元的收购要约。【原文：Canadian retailer Alimentation Couche-Tard said on Wednesday it was withdrawing its $47 billion takeover bid for Japan's Seven & i Holdings , citing a lack of "constructive" engagement.】

item.title: 台积电季度利润有望创纪录，但特朗普关税和外汇问题令人担忧
item.description: 台积电（TSMC）是全球先进人工智能芯片的主要生产商，预计本周四公布的第二季度利润将增长 52%，达到创纪录水平，不过美国关税和强劲的台币汇率可能会对其前景造成影响。【原文：TSMC , the world's main producer of advanced AI chips, is expected to post a 52% jump in second-quarter profit to record levels on Thursday, though U.S. tariffs and a strong Taiwan dollar could weigh on its outlook.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司暂停在美国销售部分汽车，因关税影响利润
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税导致更难销售各种汽车以获取利润，该公司已缩减了今年在美国的车型阵容，这是大型汽车制造商停止在美国出货的首例。【原文：Volvo Cars said it has scaled back its U.S. model lineup this year, among the first examples of a major automaker halting U.S. shipments as President Donald Trump's tariffs make it harder to sell a broad range of vehicles profitably.】

item.title: MP Materials 公司开始公开发行 5 亿美元普通股
item.description: 美国稀土矿商 MP Materials 公司周三表示，将出售 5 亿美元的普通股，此前一天，该公司与苹果公司签订了供应协议。【原文：MP Materials said on Wednesday it would sell $500 million of its common stock, a day after the U.S. rare earths miner inked a supply deal with Apple .】

item.title: BAE 系统公司开发武器化无人机应对无人机威胁
item.description: 英国 BAE 系统公司周三表示，该公司正在研发一种新型武器化无人机，旨在为军方客户提供一种成本更低的选择，以对抗在乌克兰战场上占据主导地位的无人机。【原文：BAE Systems said on Wednesday it was developing a new weaponised drone, aiming to offer military customers a lower-cost option for countering unmanned aircraft that have come to dominate the battlefield in Ukraine.】

item.title: Dollar General 首席财务官 Kelly Dilts 将于下月离职
item.description: 折扣连锁店运营商 Dollar General 周三表示，该公司财务总监 Kelly Dilts 在任职两年多一点的时间后，将于下月卸任。【原文：Discount store chain operator Dollar General's finance chief Kelly Dilts will step down next month after a little over two years in the role, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 投资者已对政策鞭打习以为常，鲍威尔头条新闻引起的反应有限
item.description: 周三有关美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的头条新闻引发的反应与美联储主席真的被解职时可能发生的反应相差甚远。【原文：Investors are becoming more measured in their reaction to news about Trump's Washington policy, with Wednesday's whipsawing headlines over Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell triggering a reaction that fell short of what could happen if the Fed chair was indeed fired.】

item.title: 沃尔玛墨西哥业务部利润下滑 10%，销售增长速度低于预期
item.description: 沃尔玛墨西哥和中美洲分部周三公布的第二季度净利润下降了 10%，为 112.3 亿墨西哥比索（约合 5.98 亿美元），低于分析师预测的近 130 亿美元，尽管收入有所增长。【原文：Walmart's Mexico and Central America unit reported a 10% dip in its second-quarter net profit on Wednesday, coming in at 11.23 billion Mexican pesos ($598 million) and below analysts' forecasts of nearly 13 billion, even as revenues grew.】

item.title: 独家报道研究人员称，与中国有关的黑客针对台湾芯片业的攻击日益增多
item.description: 研究人员周三表示，作为一连串网络间谍活动的一部分，与中国有关的黑客正把台湾半导体行业和投资分析师作为攻击目标。【原文：Chinese-linked hackers are targeting the Taiwanese semiconductor industry and investment analysts as part of a string of cyber espionage campaigns, researchers said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 交易日：特朗普-鲍威尔大戏热闹非凡，美元跌跌不休
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 消息人士称，菲利普斯 66 的 Bayway 炼油厂在停电后部分关闭
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士称，菲利普斯 66 已部分关闭了其位于新泽西州林登的日产量为 258500 桶的 Bayway 炼油厂，此前该地区的暴雨导致该厂停电。【原文：Phillips 66 has partially shut its 258,500 barrel-per-day Bayway refinery in Linden, New Jersey, after rainstorms in the region caused a power outage at the plant, three sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 亚马逊公司击败 Prime Video 用户就广告提起的诉讼
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）决定开始在其 Prime Video 服务中播放广告，除非用户每月支付 2.99 美元的退出费，联邦法官周三驳回了这一集体诉讼提案。【原文：A federal judge on Wednesday dismissed a proposed class action over Amazon.com's decision to begin showing commercials on its Prime Video service unless subscribers paid a $2.99 monthly opt-out fee.】

item.title: 特朗普称可口可乐同意在美国使用真正的蔗糖
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三表示，在他与可口可乐公司讨论后，该公司已同意在美国的饮料中使用真正的蔗糖。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Wednesday Coca-Cola had agreed to use real cane sugar in its beverages in the U.S. after his discussions with the company.】
